mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(reserv_idx) FROM reservtb WHERE reserv_idx > 0

SELECT reserv_idx ,username ,lodgingname ,reserv_date ,reserv_startDate ,reserv_startDate2 ,reserv_endDate ,reserv_num ,rtype ,ridx ,rprice ,uidx ,lidx ,limagename ,reviewCheck FROM ( SELECT reserv_idx ,username ,lodgingname ,reserv_date ,reserv_startDate ,TO_DATE(reserv_startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS reserv_startDate2 ,reserv_endDate ,reserv_num ,rtype ,v.ridx ,rprice ,u.uidx ,l.lidx ,limagename ,reviewCheck , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY reserv_idx desc ) AS rNum FROM AUSERTB u, LODGINGTB l, ROOMTB r, reservtb v WHERE l.lidx = r.LIDX AND r.ridx = v.ridx AND v.uidx = u.uidx AND u.uidx = #{uidx} )rtb WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart2} AND #{rowEnd2} ORDER BY reserv_idx DESC
SELECT lodgingname ,reserv_num ,rprice ,rtype FROM AUSERTB u, LODGINGTB l, ROOMTB r, reservtb v WHERE l.lidx = r.LIDX AND r.ridx = v.ridx AND v.uidx = u.uidx AND v.ridx = #{ridx} AND v.uidx = #{uidx}
mapper.update: UPDATE roomtb SET spareroom = spareroom+1 WHERE ridx = #{ridx}
